bibl.title: Limes XVIII. Proceedings of the XVIIIth International Congress of Roman Frontier Studies Held in Amman, Jordan (September 2000)
bibl.note: À propos de la présence de Galère en Égypte et en Palestine.
LEADBETTER William, Galerius and the Eastern Frontier.

Philip FREEMAN, Julian BENNETT, Zbigniew T. FIEMA and Birgitta HOFFMANN (Edd.), Limes XVIII. Proceedings of the XVIIIth International Congress of Roman Frontier Studies Held in Amman, Jordan (September 2000) = BAR. International Series. 1084 (Oxford, 2002) I, pp. 85-89.
